item.description:
If you haven't done it, taking photos of model railroads is a BLAST!

Meet us for a treat at the Tech Model Railroad Club at MIT on April 28.

http://tmrc.mit.edu/...

Open House runs from 2-5 and 7-10, Meet-up can be at either, vote of your choice of time on this poll: http://photo.meetup.c...

Event will be updated a few days before the event, as to the time of the meet-up, the important thing is even if you can't be there when others are, go anyway.

I went to the open house of the New England Model Railroad club in Roslindale and took these photos: http://birdman.itsama...

Both long lenses and macro play well here, these events can be crowded - bring the mono-pod.

Admission: FREE

Hope to see you there!

Paul
item.name: MIT Tech Model Railroad Club
